title: TIA Nagasaki-doza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Japanese, Organic, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Japanese name 土に命, address ビクトリア・イン長崎2F, 6-24. Veg-friendly organic buffet restaurant. The vegan items are clearly marked. Variety of dishes include soup, salad, rice, tofu, veggies, fried stuff, cooked. Has soy pudding for dessert plus juice, coffee, green tea. Frequented by locals. It's on the second floor of Victoria Inn, accessible by walking up the staircase.
